nodes.bodyText: Why is this only running in the test directory?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,25 @@
+name: user-mgmt-checkstyle
+
+on:
+  pull_request:
+    paths:
+    - 'user-registration-server-ws/user-mgmt/**'
+    - '.github/workflows/lint-user-mgmt.yml'
+jobs:
+  checkstyle_job:
+    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
+    defaults:
+      run:
+        working-directory: /user-registration-server-ws/user-mgmt
+    name: Checkstyle job
+    steps:
+    - name: Checkout
+      uses: actions/checkout@v2
+    - name: Run check style
+      uses: nikitasavinov/checkstyle-action@master
+      with:
+        github_token: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
+        reporter: 'github-pr-check'
+        level: error
+        workdir: ./user-registration-server-ws/user-mgmt/src/test

nodes.bodyText:
we are facing below issue when run the linter on the user-mgmt folder. For testing purpose I have added that. I am still working on it to resolve this issue
Only 65535 characters are allowed; 69732 were supplied. []
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,25 @@
+name: user-mgmt-checkstyle
+
+on:

+    - '.github/workflows/lint-user-mgmt.yml'
+jobs:

+    name: Checkstyle job

+    - name: Run check style
+      uses: nikitasavinov/checkstyle-action@master
+      with:
+        github_token: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
+        reporter: 'github-pr-check'
+        level: error
+        workdir: ./user-registration-server-ws/user-mgmt/src/test

nodes.bodyText: Running checkstyle locally shows that there are a lot of issues being reported. Seems like a lot of ones related to indentation.
